work_experience.title: Web Developer
work_experience.description:
Developed responsive marketing sites featuring rich interactions built in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. 
 Built WordPress themes and plugins from scratch, as well as contributed to high traffic sites such as Tim Ferriss’s blog on WordPress VIP.
 Contributed to the front-end development (CSS and AngularJS) of Filament, the company’s blog analytics web application.

work_experience.title: Web Developer & Graphic Designer
work_experience.description:
Developed complex WordPress sites for small business clients, involving custom themes and plugins. 
 Designed logos for clients upon request, as well as provided branding and website management advice. Managed content creation including blog posts, social media updates and calendar of events. 
 Managed and created newsletter campaigns for clients.

work_experience.title: Web Designer & Developer
work_experience.description:
Developed new studio website using the Genesis framework in WordPress. Features included portfolio of case studies that allowed for flexible content, as well as a responsive design. 
 Designed and developed websites for studio clients. Designed banner ads, presentations and other graphics for client work. 
Updated, maintained and improved SEO on existing client websites.

work_experience.description:
